name: GraviToss (DiamondEMA)
description:
GraviToss is an eerie gravity-shifting 3D platformer where you fling yourself around a cosmic beach environmental puzzle. 

Left becomes up and up becomes down with fast and smooth gravity slinging. It contains intentionally mind-boggling movement,  horror vibes, cosmic portals, and conversational snails.

Will you have the mind power to make it to the end?

Controls

-w and point to move

-Tab to shift gravity

-1 to reset to your save point
